intro: Find it and smile! A family-friendly tuna hunt!
description:
Among a sea of kanji characters, there is one hidden character for “tuna.”  
Find the correct one within the time limit, and enjoy a quick brain-training spot-the-difference game!

How to play:
• Look closely at the puzzle image  
• When you find the different tuna character, tap it before time runs out!

It may look easy if you stare long enough,  
but with a time limit it becomes surprisingly tricky!

If you get stuck, press the hint button.  
(It will roughly show you where to look.)



The game supports both button controls and touch controls, allowing you to play in TV mode, handheld mode, or tabletop mode.
※This game is designed to be played on the Nintendo Switch™ in vertical orientation.
